title: 31 - High on Loving You - Spiritual Abuse Part 4
description:
In this episode we talk about what it means to be H.O.L.Y. according to the Pharisees.  Andy sings High On Loving You and has rants.  Mike has rants.  In addition, we talk about hypocrisy and personal experiences around it.  We take a little bit of time to lament Mrs. Erre's new musical interest, Justin Timberlake.  At least she's no longer a belieBer.  Check out Larry Osborne's book, Accidental Pharisees as mentioned on the show.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
